content.rendered:
Directed by Vikramjit Singh.

Written by Vikramjit Singh. Hussain Dalal.

Cast Arjun Rampal(Kabir Grewal). Jacqueline Fernandez(Ayesha / Tia). Ranbir Kapoor(Roy). Barun Chanda(Roy’s Boss) . Asif Basra(Art Dealer). Cyrus Broacha(Self). Valentine Cawley(The Auctioneer). Rajit Kapoor(Wadia). Mandana Karimi(Anita). Anupam Kher(Kabir’s Dad). Kaizaad Kotwal(Mr. Irani). Shernaz Patel(Meera Pandit). Roxana Sheidaie(Girl in the Orange Dress (as Roxana Sheidaie))

Language Hindi.

Producers Vicky Bhatia. Hanif Chunawala. Ajay Kapoor. Bhushan Kumar. Divya Khosla Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Yogesh Tevatia.

Production Freeway Pictures. T-Series.
